name: NocoDB
description: NocoDB allows building no-code database solutions with ease of spreadsheets. Bring your own database or choose ours! Millions of rows? Not a problem. Your Data. Your rules. You are in control.
longDescription: NocoDB allows building no-code database solutions with ease of spreadsheets. Bring your own database or choose ours! Millions of rows? Not a problem. Your Data. Your rules. You are in control.
